contract_details.description: Implement comprehensive documentation deduplication and consolidation to create a single source of truth, eliminate redundant documentation, and establish automated documentation maintenance processes.
contract_details.background: Documentation duplication across multiple repositories, wikis, and formats has created maintenance challenges, outdated information, and confusion for developers and stakeholders throughout the swarm.
objectives: Audit all documentation sources and identify duplication patterns
Create unified documentation platform and eliminate redundant content
Establish automated documentation generation from code
Implement documentation quality standards and consistency checks
Create centralized knowledge base with search and navigation
Establish documentation maintenance and update procedures
deliverables: Documentation duplication analysis report with consolidation strategy
Unified documentation platform with centralized knowledge base
Automated documentation generation system from code and APIs
Documentation quality standards and consistency validation tools
Search and navigation system for comprehensive knowledge discovery
Documentation maintenance workflow with automated updates
technical_requirements: Version control systems for documentation management
Search and indexing platforms for knowledge discovery
Documentation quality and consistency checking tools
Automated testing frameworks for documentation validation
success_criteria: Documentation duplication reduced by 75%+ across all sources
Unified documentation platform established as single source of truth
Automated documentation generation covering 90%+ of APIs and code
Documentation quality standards enforced with 95%+ compliance
Search and navigation reducing information discovery time by 80%
Documentation maintenance automated with 85%+ content updates

dependencies: Documentation inventory and content analysis completed
Unified documentation platform selected and configured
Version control strategy for documentation established
Stakeholder requirements for documentation structure gathered
resources_required: Version control systems and collaboration platforms
Search and indexing systems for knowledge discovery
Automated testing frameworks for content validation
Training and adoption support for documentation standards

network_unlocks: Access to Technical Documentation Working Group

contract_history.details: Contract auto-generated from Documentation Consolidation & Deduplication template
